Hepatitis Data Set

Source: R/hepatitis_docs.R
hepatitis.Rd

This data set contains information on folks that suffer from hepatitis.

Usage

hepatitis

Format

A data frame with 6497 observations (1599 Red and 4898 White) on the following 12 variables.

  • class

    • Die or Live

  • age

    • Integer

  • sex

    • Male, Female

  • steroid

    • No, Yes

  • antivirals

    • No, Yes

  • fatigue

    • No, Yes

  • malaise

    • No, Yes

  • anorexia

    • No, Yes

  • liver_big

    • No, Yes

  • liver_firm

    • No, Yes

  • spleen_palpable

    • No, Yes

  • spiders

    • No, Yes

  • ascites

    • No, Yes

  • varices

    • No, Yes

  • bilirubin

    • Numeric

    • This can also be treated as a factor

  • alk_phosphate

    • Integer

  • sgot

    • Integer

  • albumin

    • Numeric

  • protime

    • Integer

  • histology

    • No, Yes

Source

G.Gong (Carnegie-Mellon University) via Bojan Cestnik Jozef Stefan Institute Jamova 39 61000 Ljubljana Yugoslavia (tel.: (38)(+61) 214-399 ext.287)

References

https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/hepatitis/hepatitis.data https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/hepatitis
